name: Traitor
overview: The third game in the series, following Kill Em All and Countdown to Extinction, it would be followed by Hangar 18. This adventure-shooter series is packed with 7 missions and tons of weapons. You are sick and are prepared for cryogenic sleep in 2025 as tensions between the superpowers is growing and Europe is uniting to throw the US off of European soil. You awake in Paris in the year 3655 in a time of heightened mental abilities but with the major cities in ruins from a great war between the superpowers and as resources became more limited. You are told the stories of the former wars and how your skills can help in their current battle, they need someone not sensitive to psychic attacks to fight for them and so you have been revived. Can you help them to finally achieve peace through superior use of firepower?
